name: Combi Mahjong Awase uchi with Maboroshi Tsukiyo Characters
overview: Kombi Mahjong Awase Uchi with Maboroshi Tsukiyo is a cute mahjong game with 9 different female characters for the player to choose and with a story mode also. The game uses a first person perspective for the gameplay and use the mahjong for 3 players mode. Manufacturer's description: Mahjong game character for "moonlight" phantom love adventure games compatible PS appeared, enjoy Gaiden story. Rule set is freely available from more than 80 items, with a "sign system through" the new system is not so far in the game Mahjong. I'll have a variety of mini-games are also included other. Features: - First person perspective. - 2D graphics - Cartoon graphics - Mahjong theme.
